nodes.text: Located along the Corellian Run, the Doldur sector was in the Mid Rim. Planets in Doldur sector included Druckenwell, Monor II, Geridard, and Doldur itself. The Dragonflower Nebula was also located in this sector: within the Nebula was Silver Station.
During Imperial rule, the sector was governed by Moff Eisen Kerioth. It was invaded by the Yuuzhan Vong in their invasion of the galaxy.
